name: Crazy Indian (itch)
description:
Welcome to the Crazy Indian! Discover an interesting world filled with traps!

🏆 Gameplay: 🏆
Control a mad Indian through dangerous corridors, avoid predatory monsters and discover new levels!

🎮 Features: 🎮
- Beautiful levels
- Good soundtrack
- Play whenever and wherever you want
- Discover new levels
- And much more!
